content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Employer may admit the Employee to work, provided that he/she has the requisite professional qualifications, and only after he/she completed his/her initial training in the field of Occupational Health and Safety and presented an up-to-date medical certificate confirming that there are no impediments to working in a specified position.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
